roleset.name: to utter a moan or complain

example.name: prepositional Arg1
example.text: The next time [0] you hear a Member of Congress moan about the deficit [*T*-2] , [*] consider what Congress did [*T*-1] Friday .

example.name: non-prepositional Arg1
example.text: `` I 'm too old [0] [*T*-1] to waste a weekend , but that 's what I did [*T*-2] , '' the 48-year-old Mr. Juliano moans [*T*-3] .
